summary: This is a brief email forwarding a signed court bundle document titled 'SDNY Triggerfish Court Bundle copy' from Andrea Johnstone to Kathleen DuPont and Brier Temple. The email includes the original message and attachments.

persons.name: Andrea Johnstone
persons.context: Sent the original email with signed documents attached, forwarding the SDNY Triggerfish Court Bundle copy.

persons.name: Kathleen DuPont
persons.context: Primary recipient of the original email from Andrea Johnstone regarding the SDNY Triggerfish Court Bundle copy.

persons.name: Brier Temple
persons.context: Secondary recipient (Cc) of the original email from Andrea Johnstone regarding the SDNY Triggerfish Court Bundle copy.

connections.description: Andrea Johnstone sent an email with legal documents to Kathleen DuPont.
Andrea Johnstone copied Brier Temple on an email with legal documents.

events.title: Forwarding of SDNY Triggerfish Court Bundle
events.description: Andrea Johnstone forwarded signed documents titled 'SDNY Triggerfish Court Bundle copy' via email to Kathleen DuPont and Brier Temple.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a court bundle related to SDNY (Southern District of New York) Triggerfish.
The email was sent on July 1, 2020, and includes attachments of signed legal documents.
Three individuals are involved in the correspondence: Andrea Johnstone (sender), Kathleen DuPont (primary recipient), and Brier Temple (copied).
